text: 48 Hours is an American documentary/news magazine television show broadcast on the CBS network since January 19, 1988 in the United States. The show airs on Saturdays at 10:00 p.m. Eastern and Pacific Time. The show was all about crime documentaries. It showed events within a 48-hour time span. ==References== Category:1980s American television series Category:1990s American television series Category:2000s American television series Category:2010s American television series Category:CBS network shows Category:English-language television programs
title: 48 Hours (TV series)
